General.Name: Yantai Moon Co Ltd
General.Description: Moon Environment Technology Co.,Ltd. operates refrigeration and air condition business in China and internationally. It engages in research and development, and manufacturing of industrial and commercial refrigeration, and central air conditioner, as well as provision of integration and packaged service for air conditioning system and refrigeration system. The company provides refrigeration equipment, such as refrigeration compressor, condensing unit, water cooled chiller, brine chiller unit, and marine refrigeration compressor; food processing equipment including food quick freezing device, industrial dryer machine, vacuum fryer machine line, and fresh food processing machine line; and auxiliary refrigerator equipment, which includes evaporative condenser and A2 refrigerated tank. In addition, it offers industrial air cooler; cold storage panel comprising EPS insulated, metal corrugated, and polyurethane sandwich panel; ice making equipment, such as flake and block ice making machine; air conditioning equipment; and gas compression equipment including process gas compressor package unit, and screw air compressor. Further, the company provides industrial and commercial refrigeration, and environmental air condition and refrigeration solutions. Additionally, it operates marketing and service network, and spare parts distribution centres; and offers after equipment installation services for equipment testing, commissioning operator operation and maintenance training, etc., as well as lifetime services, and personalized services solutions. Moon Environment Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Yantai, China.

6.Name: Mr. Zhi Qiang  Yu
